column1: If you ship goods to a limited number of countries, select those countries whose addresses will be offered to customers by the Google Address Autocomplete. Due to Google restrictions, you can specify up to 5 countries (find more information here). Leave empty to ignore this feature.
column2: If you ship goods to a limited number of countries, select those countries whose addresses will be offered to customers by the Google Address Autocomplete. Due to Google restrictions, you can specify up to 5 countries (find more information here). Leave empty to ignore this feature.
